title: What is Pranayama
content: Pranayama is the practice of controlling and regulating the breath. It helps balance the body, mind, and emotions through conscious breathing.

title: Headstand (Sirsasana)
content: Headstand is an advanced inverted yoga posture often called the King of Asanas. It improves focus and circulation but must be practiced with proper guidance.

title: Yoga Contraindications and Safety Guidelines
content: Certain yoga poses and breathing techniques must be avoided or modified for individuals who are pregnant, have high blood pressure, glaucoma, recent surgery, or chronic medical conditions. Yoga should always be practiced with caution and professional guidance when health risks are present.
